name: CAVE81
description:
CAVE81 is a remake of a classic CHIP-8 game called "CAVE", for the Sinclair ZX81 home computer.
You must guide the character (a blinking square dot) to the end of the cave maze, without hitting the walls.

In this version, some features have been added to the original game:

  • new caves
  • 1 life / 3 lives selection
  • game speed selection
